data.title: Why is AES encryption considered secure for protecting data?
data.meta_description:
Answer: AES (Advanced Encryption Standard) encryption is considered secure for protective information for numerous motives:

1. Strong Encryption Algorithm: AES uses a symmetric key encryption algorithm that has undergone giant cryptanalysis and scrutiny via specialists in the field. It has been ...
